comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: This is cool, but let's not forget that Bitcoin is money, and participating in giveaways is a horribly inefficient way to earn money. If you treat it as a job, it probably yields a few cents per hour of work or something. Unless you live in the poorest country in the world, it's better to find an actual job and do invest your fiat money in Bitcoin. Not only it's more efficient, you will also get some skills that might help you in the long run instead of making you reliant on giveaways.
